Posts.Content: Michelle, I am very sorry to hear of your reoccurance. What inspired you to not undergo conventional therapy? God Bless you, Isabel
Posts.Title: Metastasis breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi Shirley, I had the same painful experience as you. They gave me local anesthesia. I took 4 shots before I could calm down. The dye experience was painful as well. You are not alone, I hope you are doing well. Isabel
